item.title: Security Blankets
item.description: I was feeling victimmy about my messiness the other day as I noticed our clean house revert back to an untidy state. I watched as our clean island in the kitchen seemed to slowly attract item after item to it’s surface until there was a familiar size mound of everyone’s crap. I wondered why this kept happening. Why was it so hard for me to keep things clean? My husband puts his stuff away.
